name: JumPeon
description:
"Stronger Together" is the motto of this platformer.
In this platformer you control a lot of characters.  Choose your path wisely

Controls:
WASD or Arrows  to move
E for restarting the level
and Q to switch character (you will understand in the game) 

Warning: The game is probably buggy and very bad, play at your own risk!

Things I want to do with this game:

  • Fix the jump button sound
  • Add more level
  • Make the changing character mechanic less glitchy
  • Make a better player controller
  • Add more variety to the levels

I don't know if I will ever continue this game because the code is very poorly organized and poorly written so if I have to do an update I will redo the game

Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, This is my second game jam and finished game (play the first one here, (it's also very bad))
